We're happy to accept returns within 30 days of your purchase for a full refund, excluding the original shipping cost. Here’s how it works:

  • Unopened & Unused Products: Eligible for a full refund.
  • Opened or Used Products: Subject to a restocking fee ranging from 10-30%, depending on the condition assessed by our warehouse team.
  • Custom Orders: Please note that custom orders, such as video wall displays, LED displays, and any mounting hardware, are not eligible for returns.

Return Shipping: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs to our designated warehouse in the USA. Please note that returns without a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number cannot be processed.

Refund Processing: Once we receive your return, please allow 1-2 weeks for your refund to be processed.

To initiate a return, simply send an email with your order number and reason for return to support@brightlinkav.com. We're here to help!
